mapper.sql: select sm.menu_id, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_id, sm.order_num, sm.path, sm.component, sm.component_name, sm.query_param, sm.is_frame, sm.is_cache, sm.menu_type, sm.visible, sm.status, sm.perms, sm.icon, sm.hidden_expression, sm.shop_expression, sm.create_dept, sm.create_by, sm.create_time, sm.update_by, sm.update_time, sm.remark from sys_menu sm
mapper.select: select distinct sm.menu_id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.query_param, sm.visible, sm.status, sm.perms, sm.is_frame, sm.is_cache, sm.menu_type, sm.icon, sm.hidden_expression, sm.shop_expression, sm.order_num, sm.create_time from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu rm on sm.menu_id = rm.menu_id and sm.status = '1' left join sys_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id and ro.status = '1' where sm.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and sm.status = '1' and ro.role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId}) order by sm.parent_id, sm.order_num

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and m.status = '1' left join sys_role r on r.role_id = rm.role_id and r.status = '1' where r.role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId})
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '1' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
